answers.answer: Johhs Hopkins  Medicine in Baltimore, Maryland,  says there are 25 or more digestive disorders of which many have similar symptoms. Your bloody vomit could be from a disorder you have but not know you have. The best and accurate way to determine what stomach problem you have is to visit a Gastroenterologist. This specialist can pinpoint what is causing you to vomit blood. I do not know whether alcohol affects your diabetes directly , but it may. I would suggest your using an acid - fighter for your stomach  until you visit a doctor who can diagnose your stomach condition.Harrald

question: was drinking over the weekend i am a diabetic and got sick and was throwing up it had blood in it  whats going on and i now have dull pain undermy left rib cage
title: stomach problems
